Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2015 01:46PM Valerie5746 wrote: Hi Romansma, My Onc is a Boston doc and ran a big study on P. It got approved yesterday and should be out within next weeks. I asked the insurance question and he said he can't imagine how insurance company's could get out of it. Not that that hasn't been a common problem! Great news, I hope!  Got great news myself. My TMs are still plummeting and I am at 51. 30 is normal. In any way, I have never been so close to normal in my life!! Looking up for us ladies!!!
